content.title: Minutes of the 47th Board of Governors Meeting
content.location: Conference Room, NIT Transit House, New Delhi
members_present: Prof. (Dr.) H. K. Sharma, Chairperson of BoG and Director, NIT Agartala
Smt. Darshna M. Dabral, JS & FA, IFD, MHRD, Govt. of India
Shri K. Rayan, US, MHRD, Govt. of India (Representative of the Special Secretary / Additional Secretary / Joint Secretary dealing with Technical Education, Dept. of Higher Education, MHRD)
Prof. Sharad Gokhale, Dean of Infrastructure, Planning & Management, IIT Guwahati (nominee of the Director, IITG)
Prof. (Dr.) S. C. Saha, Member, Professor, ME Dept., NIT Agartala
Dr. Subhadeep Bhattacharjee, Member, Assoc. Professor, EE Dept., NIT Agartala
Dr. Govind Bhargava, Secretary, Registrar, NIT Agartala
members_absent: Prof. Sanghamitra Bandyopadhyay, Director, Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata
The Principal Secretary to the Govt. of Tripura, Dept. of Higher Education, Agartala

agenda_items.description: Confirmation of the Minutes of the 46th Meeting of the Board of Governors, NIT Agartala
Actions taken on decisions of the 45th BOG meeting of NIT, Agartala held on November 10, 2018
Revision of allowances for faculty, Scientific/Design staff, and non-teaching staff as per 7th CPC
Revision of Pension/family pension of pre-01-01-2016 retired faculty and non-faculty
External review committee report during 24th-25th January, 2016
agenda_items.decision: Noted and approved composition of new committee

agenda_items.description: Project Monitoring Unit (PMU) report on NIT Agartala during visits on 28-29th March, 2019
Recommendations of the Oversight Committee for recruitment rules for faculty
Regularization of absence period of Mr. Swarup Paul, Assistant Professor
Investigation report on incident involving Mr. Dhrubamani Dey, Jr. Assistant
agenda_items.decision: Extend probation by one year and issue warning

agenda_items.description: Procedure for utilization of Research Operating Grant
National Pension System (NPS), employer contribution @14%
Recommendations of the 32nd Finance Committee meeting
Recommendations of the 41st Building & Works Committee meeting
Cancellation of recruitment process for Assistant Professor posts (Contract)
Revised Recruitment Rules (RRs) for Non-Teaching positions
Delegation of administrative and financial power to officials
Restructuring and distribution of Non-Teaching posts
agenda_items.decision: Approved with age relaxation and reservation as per Govt. norms

agenda_items.description: Guidelines for calculation of credit points for Faculty recruitment
MACP for 3 Group-C Non-Teaching employees
Additional list of Experts for Faculty recruitment
Annual Budget proposal for FY 2019-20
Special Repair, Retrofitting, and Upgradation of Library Building
Special Repair, Retrofitting, and Upgradation of Dhalar Hostel
Upgradation of 2-storey building beside Knowledge Centre
Recommendations of the 42nd Building & Works Committee
International Conference ICCISoT 2019 at NIT Agartala
Recommendations of the 29th Senate Meeting
agenda_items.decision: Approved with effective dates for some items

agenda_items.description: Absorption of Dr. Govind Bhargava, Registrar, and counting of past service for Pension/Leave
agenda_items.decision: To be reviewed in next meeting

agenda_items.description: Any other issue with permission of Chair

subitems.description: TEQIP-III Procurement Plan and Governance Self Review
Reallocation of Faculty positions, vacancies, and reservation
subitems.decision: Approved with Govt. norms for reservation

subitems.description: Filling posts of Deputy Registrar and Assistant Registrar on deputation

content.closure: The meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair

signatories.Secretary: Dr. Govind Bhargava, Registrar, NIT Agartala
signatories.Chairperson: Prof. (Dr.) H. K. Sharma, Director, NIT Agartala
